abilities.name: Net Shot
abilities.description: Fire a net that roots a single target.

abilities.name: Imprisonment
abilities.description: Buck creates a giant rock ring around him, trapping enemies inside with him. He has 50% damage reduction while inside the ring.

abilities.name: Heroic Leap
abilities.description: Buck leaps an incredible height and distance. Removes all debuffs on use.

abilities.name: Shrapnel Cannon
abilities.description: A massive cannon that fires 8 small pieces of shrapnel.
abilities.damage: 64 damage per hit / 8 hits per shot
